description:
Veronica Hanus

*Can you remember the difference between two hex color values? Me neither!* Entering visual representations of recent-changes into version control makes review of past changes easier & speeds acclimation to a new web project. Join me for a review of current methods & how to choose the best for you!

https://2019.pycon-au.org/talks/git-hooked-on-images-up-your-documentation-game

PyCon AU, the national Python Language conference, is on again this August in Sydney, at the International Convention Centre, Sydney, August 24 - 28 2018.

Video licence: CC BY-NC-SA 4.0 - https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/

Python, PyCon, PyConAU

Sun Aug  4 14:10:00 2019 at Cockle Bay
title: Git hook[ed]” on images & up your documentation game
